sense.gloss: Tsukushi (former province located in northern Kyūshū; later split into Chikuzen and Chikugo)
clave-like folk instrument, two bamboo pieces beaten together
chikuzenni, simmered chicken and vegetables, chicken stew with taro, carrot, burdock, etc.
Chikuzen (former province located in the west of present-day Fukuoka Prefecture)
Chikugo (former province located in the south of present-day Fukuoka Prefecture)
Chikushū (the two former provinces of Chikuzen and Chikugo)

sdata.j: ↑貴方↑↓あなた↓は、↑筑紫↑↓つくし↓↑川↑↓かわ↓に↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: You go to the Chikushi river.

sdata.j: あの↑高↑↓たか↓い↑山↑↓やま↓は↑筑波山↑↓つくばさん↓です。
sdata.e: That high mountain is Mt. Tsukuba.

words.gloss: Tsukushi (former province located in northern Kyūshū; later split into Chikuzen and Chikugo)
clave-like folk instrument, two bamboo pieces beaten together
chikuzenni, simmered chicken and vegetables, chicken stew with taro, carrot, burdock, etc.
